title: Club Issues
body: My brother is the owner of our Club. It is showing up that way for me, but he says the club is not visible to him at all. Is anyone else having this problem? Even when he is online it is now showing him as online.

replies.body:
Have your bro hit us up in a [**support ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) with the name of the Club and the Club tag and we'll hook him up with one of our tech specialists to get this sorted out. ^.^

Let me know if you have any questions.
